articles.title: F1 23’s first reveal trailer teases Braking Point 2 starring Devon Butler - Polygon
articles.description: EA Sports will begin the formal reveal of F1 23, including its launch date and other features, starting May 1. Over the weekend, racing fans got a teaser of the game’s narrative mode, including a new team and an old rival at its wheel.
articles.content:
Looks like Codemasters narrative mode will go live-action, a la Grid Legends
